title: name
description: description

title: Y
description: Y

title: Bank records
description: Your financial transactions, including each time you bought something with a credit or debit card.

title: Phone calls
description: Each phone call you have made, including when you made the call, how long it was and the number you called.

title: Emails
description: The emails you have sent and received, including when you sent them, who they were sent to and the text of the message.

title: Social media
description: The posts and comments you have made on social media such as Facebook.

title: Photos
description: The photos you have taken, especially when these are uploaded to cloud storage or posted on social media.

title: Sleep
description: How long you have slept for and at what times, and an estimate of quality of that sleep.

title: Weight
description: You weight as measured by bathroom scales.

title: Meals and diet
description: What you have eaten and when.

title: Mood self-report
description: Your mood in response to a simple prompt or question.

title: Location
description: Journeys you have made and places that you have spent time (where and when).

title: Web activity
description: The web sites you have looked at and web searches you have done.

title: Media consumption
description: The music you have listened to the videos/TV you have watched.

title: E-Health Record
description: Your electronic medical records, including alergies, current mediation, symptoms, test results and diagnoses.

title: Phone
description: Your smart phone and the apps installed on it.

title: Activity tracker
description: Your activity tracker, such as a fitbit or smart watch.

title: Databox
description: A databox device installed and running in your home, rather like a home access point for data.

title: Server
description: A computer owned and managed by someone else that runs programs and services for you.

title: Third-party service
description: An application, service or web site run by some else that you use, e.g. Facebook, Fitbit, Spotify, Google.

title: You
description: This is you!

title: Family member
description: Someone else in your family.

title: Colleague
description: Someone you work with.

title: Stranger
description: Someone you don't know at all.

title: Health professional
description: A doctor, nurse, psychiatrist or public health researcher.

title: Summary report
description: A short summary of your data or activity.

title: Detailed report
description: A detailed report of your data or activity, including very specific information about individual activities.

title: Complete data
description: A complete copy of all of the data that has been collected with nothing missed out.

title: Automatic profiling
description: A computers recommendation based on your data, for example whether or not you are "at risk".

title: Automatic alert
description: A message sent to another person automatically based on changes in your data.

title: Population analysis
description: A description of a large group of people based on data from lots of people, including you.
